title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Concorde - version 1.0.1
description:
In this video we are going to look at the latest enhancement for DC Designs Concorde which has been released today. Just a week after the initial release DC Design fixed several issues reported by users already. In this short video we will look at the changes performed by the devs.

If you would like to try Concorde yourself download it from the site below:
https://www.justflight.com/product/dc-designs-concorde-microsoft-flight-simulator
